title: Windows gorename fails with lower case drive letter
body:
Using windows power shell 

```PowerShell
PS C:\work\gopath\src\demokratiet\app> gorename -offset c:/work/gopath/src/demokratiet/app/votation.go:#363 -to VotationResult
gorename: cant find package containing c:/work/gopath/src/demokratiet/app/votation.go


PS C:\work\gopath\src\demokratiet\app> gorename -offset C:/work/gopath/src/demokratiet/app/votation.go:#363 -to VotationResult
Renamed 7 occurrences in 1 file in 1 package.
```

Notice that it only works when the drive letter is capital C
